ActJudges Act
SubjectNancy E. Tyrwhitt-Drake ** ANNUITY ** The Hon. Montague Lawrence Tyrwhitt-Drake **
PrecisGranting of an ANNUITY to NANCY E. TYRWHITT-DRAKE, survivor of the Hon. Montague Lawrence Tyrwhitt-Drake, a Judge of the Supreme Court of British Columbia, effective May 16, 2015.
